data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mvogo Ndongo, Pierre A., Schubart, Christoph D., Rintelen, Thomas Von, Tamesse, Joseph L., Cumberlidge, Neil (2017): Morphological and molecular evidence for a new species of freshwater crab of the genus Sudanonautes Bott, 1955 (Brachyura: Potamoidea: Potamonautidae) from Cameroon, with notes on its ecology. Zootaxa 4242 (1): 161-173, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4242.1.8|29 occurrences
